I’m focusing on services’ observability for the sake of SRE practices.

Ömer Erkmen who had his Electrical and Electronics degree from İTU in 1979 graduated from UCSB Computer Science with a master’s degree in 1984 joined Mekanist and became a member of the Board of Directors after completing his corporate work life at Microsoft as an instructor and advisor in the field of CRM.
data.name: Ömer Abi
data.title: Co-Founder at Yeni Nesil Kafası
data.bio: Ömer Erkmen who had his Electrical and Electronics degree from İTU in 1979 graduated from UCSB Computer Science with a master’s degree in 1984 joined Mekanist and became a member of the Board of Directors after completing his corporate work life at Microsoft as an instructor and advisor in the field of CRM. Upon acquisition of the company by Zomato in 2015, he started taking a more active role in fields of entrepreneurship and investment. He has been involved in many projects as founder, mentor and investor and he is still working in entrepreneurship field without a break. Business enterprises he has been a part of: Scorp, Flightrecorder, Ideasoft, Blesh, Temizlikyolda, Bionluk, Kolay Randevu, Connected2me, Erasmusinn and English Ninjas.

He is currently principal AI researcher at Adesso Turkey. His research interests and working area includes deepNLP, natural language processing, deep learning and machine learning. Currently working on various AI projects ranging from image processing to natural language processing at akbank bankacilik merkezi on behalf of adesso turkey.
data.shortBio: He is currently principal AI researcher at Adesso Turkey.

data.bio: Istanbul Üniversitesi İşletme Fakultesinden 2005 yılında mezun olan Simay Dinç 10 yıl boyunca teknoloji, sanat ve oyun için 35’i aşkın ülkeye tek başına seyahat etti, eğitim ve araştırma yapma fırsatı buldu.  Women in Games Turkiye’nin kurucusu olan Simay Dinç, sinematografik mobil oyunlar üreten Recontact Games’in kurucu ortağı. Yapımcısı olduğu Recontact:Istanbul, Apple tarafından 2015 yılında Türkiye’nin en iyi mobil oyun seçildi, 153 ülkede en yenilikçi oyun kategorisinde lanse edildi. İkinci projeleri Türkiye’nin ilk sinematografik mobil oyunu olan ‘Eyes of Sky’ dünya çapında ödüller aldı. Oyun dünyasının potansiyeline ve sosyal etkisine inanan Simay Dinç, Ayvalık’ta köy çocuklarına ücretsiz oyun tasarımı, kodlama, sinematografi gibi derslerin verildiği, yaratıcı endustriler için tasarlanmış co-working alanı ”Kıraarthane”nin kurucu ortağı. Simay, sadece kendi girişimleri üzerinde çalışmıyor aynı zamanda Rising Tide Europe’da melek yatırımcı olarak yer alıyor ve yaratıcı endustrilere yatırım yapıyor.
data.shortBio: Istanbul Üniversitesi İşletme Fakultesinden 2005 yılında mezun olan Simay Dinç 10 yıl boyunca teknoloji, sanat ve oyun için 35’i aşkın ülkeye tek başına seyahat etti, eğitim ve araştırma yapma fırsatı buldu...
data.name: Simay Dinç
data.title: OYUNDER

data.name: Ahmet Keskin
data.bio: Ahmet keskin, 2013 yılından beri iOS uygulamaları geliştirmektedir. Kısa bir Objective-c macerası ile başlayıp Swift 1.2 ile devam eden serüveni farklı tarzda bir sürü iOS uygulamaları yaparak devam etmiştir. 2016 Nisan ayının başında ise dolap.com şirketinin kuruluş zamanlarında işe girmiş, iOS uygulamasini yapmaya başlamıştır. İki sene sonunda Trendyol.com'un dolap.com'u satın alması sonrası 1 şubat 2018 itibari ile trendyol.com iOS ekibine katılmış ve bir yıl dokuz aydır Trendyol şirketinde iOS geliştirici olarak çalışmaya devam etmektedir. Vakit buldukça blog yazmayı/okumayı sever, open source dünyasına katkı sağlamaya çalışmaktadır.
data.title: iOS Developer
data.shortBio: Ahmet keskin, 2013 yılından beri iOS uygulamaları geliştirmektedir. Kısa bir Objective-c macerası ile başlayıp Swift 1.2 ile devam eden serüveni farklı tarzda bir sürü iOS uygulamaları yaparak devam etmiştir.

data.name: Alaa Alnuaimi
data.bio: My name is Alaa Alnuaimi, I am a designer and developer living in Istanbul. I work as creative director at -99 design studio, which I have also co-founded. I also hold the position of Front-end team leader at Proj-e Software. For the last two years code jury at Awwwards. Raised by a painter and sculptor I have a great deal of passion for fine art and calligraphy. I am lucky to have both design and technical background, allowing me to work across both disciplines.

In Carolyn’s free time, she enjoyed attending tech meetups, conference, and networking events, and meet different people. She has passion about IT technologies in different industries.

Developed a handful Android applications since then with variety of technical challenges. Also likes to try new things. He developed software for other platforms professionally and personally. Hadi likes to share his experiences so he is writing blog posts in Turkish and English. He is really active in community slack channels to help people out and get helped. He also gives talks about Android development mostly about on Kotlin related subjects. Hadi loves to learn new things and share it with people.

data.shortBio: Kemal Ugur is the Co-Founder and CEO of Pixery.
data.name: Kemal Ugur
data.title: Co-Founder & CEO
data.bio: Kemal Ugur is the Co-Founder and CEO of Pixery. With two R&D offices in Istanbul & Ankara, Pixery is a global tech company building innovative video focused apps for next generation mobile creatives. Before that, Kemal was leading the Audiovisual Content Representation team at Nokia Research Center, where he invented/co-invented many technologies that are included in video coding standards. Kemal is an inventor/co-inventor of around 70 patent applications and 50 academic publications in these areas.

data.name: Kevin Nelson
data.bio: Kevin is a Google Cloud Developer Advocate focused on machine learning and enterprise strategic partners. He speaks frequently at developer-focused events around the world. Before joining the Cloud team, he was a lead Product Manager on Google Drive for two years. Prior to joining Google in 2014, Kevin was a successful serial entrepreneur with over 20 years of experience building and managing software and SAAS companies. In his free time, Kevin is an avid traveler, sailor, brewer and history buff who loves stargazing and studying the Age of Exploration. Mr. Nelson received his degree in Information and Computer Science from the University of California at Irvine.
data.title: Architect Advocate
data.shortBio: Kevin is a Google Cloud Developer Advocate focused on machine learning and enterprise strategic partners.

data.name: Mark Stephens
data.bio: Mark Stephens has been a speaker at DevFest 13,14, 15, 17 and 18. He is a software developer and the founder of IDRsolutions, which develops a Java PDF library and a PDF to HTML5/SVG converter. This year he is doing 3 technical talks at Oracle CodeOne and also talking at NetBeans UK, and Dawscon 2020 in Montreal.  Mark has an MSC degree in Computer Science and an MA in Mediaeval History with a detailed knowledge of Byzantine and Ottoman History. So DevFest is his dream conference where he can combine his passion for software and history.

data.shortBio: Caner is a Multi-Disciplinary Designer who is also a technology geek.
data.name: Resul Caner Yıldırım
data.title: UX Designer
data.bio: Caner is a Multi-Disciplinary Designer who is also a technology geek. Mainly focused on the design, business strategy, and marketing of mobile applications. Passionate about good design, UX and Conversation Design.  Previously he worked for leading companies of Turkey on mobile projects. Today, he is the founder of Artisan UX a design agency based in Istanbul making and creating apps that users love.  Caner has been a user group leader for GDG Istanbul since 2013, organizing, participating, and speaking at events. He shares his experience in User Experience, Product Design, Conversation Design, UX Strategy and so on via talks or workshops at Droidcons, DevFests, and other tech or product conferences.

data.shortBio: Sascha Wolter is a professional developer and user experience enthusiast.
data.name: Sascha Wolter
data.bio: Sascha Wolter is a professional developer and user experience enthusiast. His true passion is to improve the human-computer interaction: He loves to build conversational and multimodal experiences with text (chatbots) and voice (aka Alexa). Sascha works as a consultant, trainer, lecturer, speaker, and author who focusses on understanding, innovation, and value. As such he is committed to the interests of all kinds of developers, users, and prosumers. When Sascha is not developing new ideas, he likes hiking and skiing in the mountains, enjoys good Italian coffee and loves to explore the world together with his kids in an odd way.  After organizing internationally renowned events, he is now board member of the Usability & User Experience working group at the federal association BITKOM. Furthermore, he is Google Developer Expert for IoT/Assistant (GDE) and Microsoft Most Valuable Professional (MVP). Before he joined the Conversational AI Platform Company Cognigy as Senior UX Consultant and Principal Technology Evangelist, he worked as Senior Developer Evangelist at Deutsche Telekom (i.e. Smart Home) and Senior Technology Evangelist for Alexa at Amazon.
data.title: Principal Technology Evangelist Conversational AI & Senior User Experience Consultant Conversation Design

data.name: Selin Alara Örnek
data.bio: 13 yaşındayım, Özel Küçük Prens Ortaokulu 8. sınıf öğrencisiyim, LGS'ye hazırlanıyorum :) 8 yaşından beri kodlama ve robotik ile uğraşıyorum. Uluslararası teknoloji yarışmaları ve "showcase"lerine katılıyorum. 2018 yılında Coderdojo Coolest Projects Yarışmasında projem ic4u ile 1. oldum. European Youth Awards 2018 yarışmasında da finalist oldum. 2019 yılında Stanford üniversitesinde düzenlenen robotik ve mühendislik yaz okuluna burslu olarak davet edildim. Aydın Doğan Vakfının Unicef ve BM ile düzenlediği #güçlükızlargüçlüyarınlar 2019 projesinde yer aldım. Türkçe, İngilizce ve Fransızca biliyorum. Python kodlama dili üzerinde çalışıyorum. Annem, Babam ve köpeğim Bailey ile İstanbul'da yaşıyorum.

data.bio: M. Yusuf Sarıgöz is a co-founder and AI engineer at Turkish startup AI Labs, innovating the retail industry with deep learning solutions. His main interests lie in deep learning for computer vision and neural machine translation. He has a long experience in large-scale and efficient face recognition on the edge and fully unsupervised neural machine translation in unparallel corpora, and has developed new model architectures in these fields. Sarıgöz is also a Google Developer Expert on Machine Learning and highly active in AI/ML community, facilitating workshops on Tensorflow, Keras and AI/ML in the cloud and mentoring scholars in Sabancı Foundation Scholarship Program.
data.shortBio: M. Yusuf Sarıgöz is a co-founder and AI engineer at Turkish startup AI Labs, innovating the retail industry with deep learning solutions.
data.name: M. Yusuf Sarıgöz
data.title: Co-Founder and AI Engineer at AI Labs, Google Developer Expert on Machine Learning
